text: Jennifer Elisabeth Crouse (born 6 June 1974) is an American rugby union player. She was named 2004 USA Women's Rugby Player of the Year, and a Women’s Rugby Player of the Decade. She was named a 2006 Women’s World Cup All-Star. She played for the United States women's national rugby union team at the 2002 and 2006 Women's Rugby World Cup. She played for University of Connecticut.Beantown RFC.Berkeley All Blues. == References == Category:1988 births Category:Living people Category:American rugby union players
title: Jen Crouse
